name: Cyclops Oracle

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The cyclops makes three attacks, using Radiant Strike or Flash of Light in any combination.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +10, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 22 (3d10 + 6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Flash of Light
actions.description: *Ranged Attack Roll:* +10, range 120 ft. *Hit:* 17 (2d10 + 6) Radiant damage, and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the cyclops's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The cyclops casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):

reactions.name: Portent (Recharge 4--6)
reactions.description: *Trigger:* The cyclops or an ally it can see makes a D20 Test. *Response:* The cyclops rolls 1d20 and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

lore:
*Monocular Servants of Destiny*
**Habitat:** Coastal, Desert, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Underdark; **Treasure:** Armaments
Cyclopes are gigantic, one-eyed descendants of the gods. Using their mystical vision, cyclopes can witness how future events are likely to occur.
Cyclops oracles gaze through history to learn hidden truths. Many share these secrets with those who aid them in correcting the mistakes of the past.
Most cyclops sentries serve their divine progenitors and oppose those who would tamper with fate.
